entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
